FAQs about different types of phishing
Below you will find answers to some popular\xa0questions surrounding different types of phishing attacks.
 Once the\xa0 malicious code\xa0is in place, your web traffic may be directed to fake and malicious websites\xa0without your\xa0 knowledge or approval, leading you to unknowingly expose private\xa0information to\xa0hackers.
 Whaling
